channel.title: Fan made trailer
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-P2C6LC9CZg[/url]
i know the quallity sucks but im thinking about reuploading a HD verson. just messin around with vegas, just got it. first editing project so it sucks haha but tell me whatcha think :smiley:

item.title: Fan made trailer
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
dankonen:

Metalheads (like myself) love this stuff. But the greater part of the public wants other music. I like metal, just not in trailers. If you could find a fitting fiddle to go with the images, and try to keep the images as clear as possible, than you have a nice video there. Try playing with your shots before you select a specific tune.

Again. I personally like the music and the weird psychedelic images you show. Though the general public doesn’t.

It doesn’t suck because it has metal in it, it sucks because that song doesn’t go with Half-Life.

Just because (and I’m not saying that I like that particular song) you put good music to a video doesn’t mean it was a good choice of music.

Something more Sci-Fi-ey should have been chosen. I’m not just going to say techno cuz its maed wif de computars. It should feel Sci-Fi, you honestly would have been better off using a song out of the HL1/2 soundtrack or some of the already released Black Mesa music from their sound track.

Read full topic

item.title: Fan made trailer
item.dc:creator: RebornShadow
item.description:
If you did that with Vegas it’s a pretty poor editing. I could have done that with Movie Maker

And… change the music so it fits to Half Life… the music you used doesn’t fit into the video at all.

Aaaaand it’s Half Life not BM.

Read full topic
